lines.text:
[on analyzing a ghost by electronic means]
Let's say it's a mass of data... waiting for a correct interpretation.
Taskerlands is full of rats. We used to play up there when I was a kid.
Rats wouldn't have left that Spam. They'd have chewed those tins open in no time.

These walls are a lot older than the rest of the house. They've just been - built onto. In fact, they must have been knocked down and rebuilt and generally messed about a lot in the last thousand years. Oh, yes. The foundations might be Saxon.
